alert.note: Alert for Great Salt Lake Desert and Mountains; Lower Washington County; Southwest Utah; Tooele and Rush Valleys; Western Millard and Juab Counties (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Watch issued June 15 at 2:27PM MDT until June 17 at 10:00PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WATCH IN EFFECT FROM FRIDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH FRIDAY EVENING... * WHAT...South to southwest winds 35 to 45 mph with gusts in excess of 60 mph possible. * WHERE...Great Salt Lake Desert and Mountains, Tooele and Rush Valleys, Western Millard and Juab Counties, Southwest Utah and Lower Washington County. * WHEN...From Friday afternoon through Friday evening. * IMPACTS...High winds may move loose debris, damage property and cause power outages. Travel could be difficult especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts and warnings for updates on this situation. Fasten loose objects or shelter objects in a safe location prior to the onset of winds.

area.areaDesc: Great Salt Lake Desert and Mountains; Lower Washington County; Southwest Utah; Tooele and Rush Valleys; Western Millard and Juab Counties
